Synopsis:
---------
Justin Quayle (Fiennes) is a British diplomat in Kenya whose wife is murdered by a man suspected of being her lover, a defender of human rights activist in the region. Quayle then decides to investigate the murders, and he begins to discover much more than I expected ...
